title: SOLD: 1899 M101-1 Sporting News Supplement - Cy Young (BGS 1)
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1899 M101-1 Sporting News Supplement - Cy Young (BGS 1)
posts.post_content:
Good Evening, Collectors:

Up for sale tonight is a very rare 1899 M101-1 Sporting News Supplement - Cy Young which has been graded a BGS 1 by the strict graders at Beckett Grading Services, the industry leader in third-party grading. Please review scans of the front and back of the item for condition details. Sale price on this beauty is $SOLD dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]
